Introduction
This topic contains information on the approval and notification of FPOW determinations, including
FPOW decision format and criteria
submitting an FPOW determination for approval
format of letter requesting Compensation Service approval of an FPOW status determination
, and
notifying the claimant of the FPOW determination
.
